title: Person of Interest - Play by the rules (05x10)
author: POI - Best Of
comment: You can almost feel Harold's inner meltdown. I guess Elias was right concerning Harold: him being the worst / the darkest of them all.
I'd like to get the scene extended to the point right before when the agent tells why they can't charge him yet
Are you still there? I would really appreciate it, if you could upload some/a scene with Elias.
Finch is the one who knocks
